heading: HR00915
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION AND OTHER RELEVANT AGENCIES TO COME UP WITH A NATIONAL POLICY GUIDELINES FOR PRIVATE AND PUBLIC SCHOOLS THAT WILL BALANCE THE INTEREST OF LEARNERS, SCHOOLS, TEACHERS AND PARENTS IN THE RETURN TO SCHOOL PROCESS IN THE INCOMING ACADEMIC YEAR
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2020-05-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00915
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION AND OTHER RELEVANT AGENCIES TO COME UP WITH A NATIONAL POLICY GUIDELINES FOR PRIVATE AND PUBLIC SCHOOLS THAT WILL BALANCE THE INTEREST OF LEARNERS, SCHOOLS, TEACHERS AND PARENTS IN THE RETURN TO SCHOOL PROCESS IN THE INCOMING ACADEMIC YEAR
